title: Mort Nightshade

properties.value: Mort Nightshade is a vampyre found in the northern area of Darkmeyer. He can be pickpocketed at 82 Thieving.

Mort Nightshade

NPC ID9689

Mort Nightshade is a vampyre found in the northern area of Darkmeyer. He can be pickpocketed at 82 Thieving.

Pickpocketing[edit | edit source]

Mort Nightshade
Level required 82
Thieving XP306.9 xp
TypePickpocket
ToolNone

A successful pickpocket attempt will gain one the following items:

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Coins250–315109/132250–315250–315
Death rune28/132376216
Blood rune42/1321,248960
Blood pint16/132870
Uncut ruby15/1321,20760
Diamond11/1321,8471,200
Cooked mystery meat11/1322720
Blood shard11/5,0006,964,3400

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • His examine text is a reference to Buffy the Vampire Slayer, where one of the characters, Spike, answers Buffy's question of what he's doing near her place in five words: "Out. For. A. Walk... Bitch!"
  • Mort come from the Latin mors, meaning death.
  • Nightshade comes from the plant of the same name.
  • His surname is one of the possible vampyric names that can be given to players.

[[File:Mort Nightshade chathead.png|left]]
'''Mort Nightshade''' is a vampyre found in the northern area of [[Darkmeyer]]. He can be pickpocketed at 82 [[Thieving]].

==Pickpocketing==
{{Thieving info
|name = Mort Nightshade
|level = 82
|xp = 306.9
|type = Pickpocket
|tool = None
}}

{{Pickpocket/Vyre}}

==Dialogue==
{{Hastranscript|npc|Transcript:Vyre}}

==Trivia==
* His examine text is a reference to {{WP|Buffy the Vampire Slayer}}, where one of the characters, Spike, answers Buffy's question of what he's doing near her place in five words: "Out. For. A. Walk... Bitch!"
* Mort come from the Latin ''mors'', meaning death.
* Nightshade comes from the {{WP|Nightshade|plant}} of the same name.
* His surname is one of the possible [[vampyric name]]s that can be given to players.
